about_the_game:
Take a look at your favorite cities in ten years.

8 cities from the original campaign will be available in this extension. City boundaries expanded significantly. The game area increased by 65%. New passenger and cargo stations appeared in all cities. New roads, bridges, stadiums, residential areas, and such industrial facilities as plants and harbors were built on the outskirts of the cities.

Provincial town

The small provincial town became bigger. Yet it is still as cozy as it was. The area of the city increased three times.


  • There were 4 passenger stations in the city.


  • Now there are 7 passenger stations in the city.

City by the bay

The picturesque city is divided by a bay and a ridge into two parts. The two parts of the city are connected by several tunnels. The area of the city doubled.


  • There were 5 passenger stations in the city.


  • Now there are 8 passenger stations in the city.

Shoreline

The coastal city is divided into two parts by a channel. During the last 10 years, the city grew along the shoreline significantly and became a large trade center. The area of the city doubled.


  • There were 6 passenger and 4 cargo stations in the city.


  • Now there are 10 passenger and 7 cargo stations in the city.

River crossing

The big city is situated at an intersection of two rivers. Its area grew considerably in ten years: new residential areas and plants appeared. A new ring highway around the city was built. The area of the city increased by 55%.


  • There were 11 passenger and 6 cargo stations in the city.


  • Now there are 14 passenger and 8 cargo stations in the city.

Business center

A large trade center is full of life. The city is situated at the intersection of two highways and is surrounded by a ring highway. The area of the city increased by 40%.


  • There were 11 passenger and 6 cargo stations in the city.


  • Now there are 15 passenger and 9 cargo stations in the city.

Seaport

A new island with a major seaport and a cargo station appeared on the map. There are tankers, bulk carriers, and floating docks in the port. A ring highway is built around the city. The area of the city increased by 60%.


  • There were 12 passenger and 5 cargo stations in the city.


  • Now there are 14 passenger and 8 cargo stations in the city.

Islands in the ocean

Five large islands appeared on the map. Residential areas with four passenger stations are located on two islands. Cargo stations and different port facilities are located on the other three islands. The area of the city increased by 65%.


  • There were 13 passenger and 5 cargo stations in the city.


  • Now there are 17 passenger and 9 cargo stations in the city.

Big city

The big city became even bigger. The urban area became even denser. New residential areas, cargo, and passenger stations appeared on the outskirts of the city. A new tanker jetty was built. The area of the city increased by 55%.


  • There were 15 passenger and 7 cargo stations in the city.


  • Now there are 19 passenger and 11 cargo stations in the city.

name: My Train Arrives - In ten years

package_groups.title: Buy My Train Arrives - In ten years

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
